Our  mission at Channel 6 Media is to launch the Global Equality Movement (GEMS). It includes many thing but we aim to create develop and deliver broadcasting and media opportunities to strengthen diversity and democratic plurality, globally. In other words, we create media to advance equality and human rights for all people. 

Further to that, I believe that if you want something you must do it your self. The media that we produce is about many things but underlying all we do is to empower people so that they can do for themselves. (give a man a fish he eats for a day but teach him how to fish he'll eat forever).

lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lenders.name: JagadGuru
lenders.occupational_info: Jagad Guru (Chris Butler) Siddhaswarupananda Paramahamsa is a highly respected yoga guru (teacher) coming in a long line of authentic spiritual masters, known as the Brahma Madhva Gaudiya Sampradaya , in the ancient Vedic tradition known as Vaishnavism.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: Women should be able to affect their living conditions.

lenders.name: Judith
lenders.loan_because: I believe in it.  It's not that I have extra money sitting around that I don't need, but ultimately I believe that we are here to help one another.  Also, it is surpising how $25 can "go" farther for these people in their countries than it does here for me!
lenders.occupational_info: What I've worked with for 31 years is a very powerful hands-on healing work that has dramatically improved my life and made changes in thousands of others' lives.  I'm passionate about doing and teaching it.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: improving someone else's life can also improve my own.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a civilian engineer for the US Navy.

lenders.name: Bonnie
lenders.loan_because: I want to help other people do something to make them happy
lenders.occupational_info: I help people with their banking making deposits and giving them money from their bank accounts.

lenders.name: ScienceofIdentity
lenders.occupational_info: The Science of Identity Foundation was established by Jagad Guru Chris Butler in 1977 in order to pass on the ancient teachings of yoga in a scientific, logical, and clear manner

lenders.name: Maps & Trinz
lenders.loan_because:
We can't say it better than it has already been said:
'Be the Change You Want to See in the World' - Ghandi
lenders.occupational_info: We work and travel, travel and work.

lenders.name: Pangolin
lenders.loan_because: I know that a little money, in the right hands, can make a positive impact.

lenders.name: Molly
lenders.loan_because: A little goes a long way

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I would like to help others who have little access to world monetary systems succeed in business .
lenders.occupational_info: I spend about half my time in entertainment and acting and musical performance activities and the other half dealing with business and tax matters in my other "role" as a CPA in USA.

lenders.name: Twilight
lenders.loan_because: We have to look out for our fellow brothers and sisters in this world and show them love. Love conquers all.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: To live simply and help others live well is the way of well being for everyone.

lenders.name: Catherine
lenders.loan_because: I am starting a business myself and realise I am very fortunate to have access to funding.  This is an effective way to give a hand up to someone with the same business aspirations and hopefully result in a successful and sustainable enterprise.
lenders.occupational_info: I study part-time, I work in an office part-time doing office admin (accounting etc) and I am the Sales & Marketing partner in a small business based in New Zealand.

lenders.name: Meg
lenders.loan_because: I've always wanted to change/help the world in some ways. As tiny as it may be, I do my bits.
lenders.occupational_info: I am doing research about corporate social responsibility. Assuming there are companies taking care of the society they operate in; the focus of my study is to investigate how these companies can communicate with their consumers.

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: God has given me so much and I want to share His goodness with others.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach people how to know God better through His Son, Jesus Christ, from the Bible.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: I loan because, increasing commerce at a micro finance level is the most effective way of stimulating a developing economy. It bypasses the potentially corrupt and beaurocratic governments and does not suffer from the negative side effects of aid.
lenders.occupational_info: I design and develop websites.

lenders.name: Floyd
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of loaning money that is paid back to develop economic independence rather than giving money and developing dependence.  I have traveled in Mexico, Africa and the Middle East and have seen how much thought and effort people are willing to put into developing their livelihoods under challenging conditions and how much more can be done if the opportunity is there.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a biologist that studies the genetics of populations to learn how species evolve.

lenders.name: Jacqueline
lenders.loan_because: I want to help make a difference at a local level.

lenders.name: Gabriele
lenders.loan_because: I like to support people who have ideas and want to change their situation by their own. Doing something is better than to be on welfare.
lenders.occupational_info: I am travelling a lot in Germany and Austria, selling plastic products for labs. I love to be independent, taking the burden of working hard.

lenders.name: Pascal Van Hecke
lenders.occupation: Privacy expert, IT trainer, RubyOnRails developer
lenders.loan_because:
"Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day. Teach a man to fish and you feed him for a lifetime"

[man = m/f, Chinese Proverb]
lenders.occupational_info:
Note: the money I put into Kiva comes from advertising (some $10/mth) on pet project websites.

By doing this consistently for years, and use automatic relending (my input has been reused for up to 2 times a year) I' ve been able to contribute a little to many more people's lives than I ever thought possible - with what I considered pocket money.

Thank you, internet, for letting me do this.

lenders.name: Amund
lenders.loan_because: I use most of my money on useless things, I want to change that.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a computer system developer. I make programs, small tools and web-pages. I also help people with computer problems.

lenders.name: Asgeir
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people help them self! This is a greate way to actually se that the help gets to the persons who need it and not ending up lost in some big organization.

lenders.name: Cheryl & Al's Family
lenders.loan_because: We have been blessed in may ways

lenders.name: Michel
lenders.loan_because: I can, so why not?
lenders.occupational_info: Studying/working in digital forensic research.

lenders.name: Marit
lenders.loan_because: I like the concept of supporting someone directly, and I have a little to spare.

lenders.name: carlos
lenders.loan_because: Being poor is a state of mind, the small business people on Kiva that need financing are not poor, they are on their way to success. HAVING LITTLE MONEY IS BEING BROKE

lenders.name: Severi
lenders.loan_because: Yes, we can

lenders.name: Larry
lenders.loan_because: my friend, ngungo, got me interested in Kiva. It seemed like my help could make a big difference in some people's lives, perhaps even my own.
lenders.occupational_info: I was involved in scientific research to help people better understand the world around us.

lenders.name: Bjorn Dahlman
lenders.loan_because: this is a way for people to get independant and make a good life
